h1_title: How to Find All Purple Talisman Altars in Chapter 4
content: Chapter 4 of Black Myth: Wukong has plenty of secrets to discover and one of these involves collecting the purple talismans you can find hanging from altars in the Webbed Hollow and Temple of the Yellow Flowers. Collecting them all will prompt cutscenes and a meeting with a hidden boss, so here's everything you need to do to uncover this extra content.
promot:
This is an excerpt from the file 'How_to_Find_All_Purple_Talisman_Altars_in_Chapter_4.md', within the main section titled 'How to Find All Purple Talisman Altars in Chapter 4'.
The content is as follows:
Chapter 4 of Black Myth: Wukong has plenty of secrets to discover and one of these involves collecting the purple talismans you can find hanging from altars in the Webbed Hollow and Temple of the Yellow Flowers. Collecting them all will prompt cutscenes and a meeting with a hidden boss, so here's everything you need to do to uncover this extra content.
